thread.section_title: Optimalprint Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Optimalprint | optimalprint.ca
thread.title: Danielle Yehuda

author: Danielle Yehuda
title: Danielle Yehuda
text:
Optimalprint was such an easy to use website, the order came very quickly and the quality is really good. I loved the variety of styles I was able to choose from.
The only thing I have to say is that when I added the picture to customize my order, I wasn't able to adjust the picture in many ways or add a filter like I am able to do in other websites similar to Opitmalprint.
